author: Matt Somerfield
title: What has happened with Red Bull’s rear wing in Las Vegas?
text: Red Bull has found itself on the back foot at the Las Vegas Grand Prix, with the rear wing it is running proving to be much draggier than what its rivals have on board. In a bid to help Max Verstappen and Sergio Perez attack the long straights, Red Bull arrived in Las Vegas with a trimmed rear and beam wing arrangement rather than designing a bespoke solution specifically for this track. This lowest drag arrangement is similar to what it took to Monza, but it has been a bit more aggressive this time around in trimming away more of the flap (yellow dotted line, for comparison). It wasn’t enough though, as the team found itself up to 7km\/h down on its rivals in some of the speed traps during FP1. In response to this deficit, it cut away more of the upper flap’s trailing edge in a bid to get rid of as much drag as possible. This can be seen in the image below, as one of the mechanics cuts away the carbon fibre along a guide line that’s been drawn on the element, whilst another vacuums up the debris. This not only removes material from the existing crescent shaped cutout, but it also extends into and removes the central V groove that was present before, leaving very little material around the DRS anchor point. Beyond the main rear wing, there is just a single element beam wing installed on the RB20, which has also been trimmed significantly along the trailing edge. This leaves just a jagged full chord section in the central section to frame the exhaust’s tailpipe. Red Bull also has a revised front wing layout in Las Vegas, with flaps that feature less camber and chord length, to help balance the downforce level, front-to-rear. However, what does seem odd in its aerodynamic set-up is that it has opted for what has been attributed as its higher downforce engine cover variant. Introduced at the Hungarian Grand Prix (above, left) the solution is much more tapered at the rear of the car when compared with the unique cooling inlet and high-haunched arrangement that the RB20 used throughout the opening phase of 2024 (above, right). Red Bull fitted the RB20 with its older specification layout at both the Italian and Azerbaijan Grands Prix, making it what many assumed as a shoo-in for a return in Las Vegas. However, it hasn’t appeared as of yet. Red Bull Racing RB20 sidepods detail Photo by: Giorgio Piola Red Bull has also introduced a non-circuit specific fence update in Las Vegas, with the team continuing to search for additional performance from the RB20, even in this latter stage of the season. It is a design feature we have seen some of its rivals use in the past, with the second inboard floor fence now raised above the floor’s tideline and angled to ensure it sheds a vortex from its surface that will help flow across the upper surface of the floor. The overall shape of the fence below the tideline has been altered too, with a much squarer leading edge than was previously employed in the outgoing design. Click to join the Motorsport Discord Read Also: Formula 1Red Bull stuck with wrong rear wing for Las Vegas GP Formula 1Explained: The consequences from F1 closing its skid block loophole Formula 1Ferrari struggling for tyre temperature on 'Turkey 2020' low-grip Las Vegas

author: Shawn Johnson
title: 7 entrepreneurs received Starter Company Plus support
text:
Choose Cornwall
Cornwall, Ontario – Cornwall Business Enterprise Center is pleased to announce seven successful grant recipients in the spring session of the popular Starter Company Plus program.
The Starter Company Plus program provides free practical training for new entrepreneurs interested in start-up support for their business. The 12-week program is open to Cornwall, SDG and Akwesasne residents in the spring and fall. Funding is provided by the Province of Ontario and administered by the Cornwall Business Enterprise Center (CBEC).
Participants receive assistance to start, grow or buy a small business which includes training, advice and support provided by CBEC with the help of local industry experts. A limited number of participants are invited to present their new business to the grant panel in order to qualify for a grant. Applicants with the highest scores are eligible for grants, which can be spent on equipment, supplies, marketing and many other business development initiatives.
“The Starter Company Plus program has proven to be an excellent resource for local entrepreneurs looking to start or expand their business,” said Shauna Baggs of Cornwall Business Enterprise Centre. “It is always a pleasure to see new entrepreneurs take their business idea forward and develop confidence throughout the programme. It is very rewarding to work with such a diverse range of business owners in Cornwall, SDG and Akwesasne and I look forward to seeing all participating businesses succeed.
The Fall 2023 session was very competitive, with an initial enrollment of 49 entrepreneurs. After several weeks of hard work, only 14 participants were selected to present their business idea to the grant panel, with seven participants receiving grants of up to $4,500.
Congratulations to the Fall 2023 Starter Company Plus recipients:
Melissa St. Louis – Seaway Charters – Your Local Transportation
Brett Conway – Aminoates Inc.
Robin Neville – Neville HVAC/R Inc.
Angela Youngs – Ground Soap
Judy Read – Celebrate Events
Emily Miller – Mood Kit
Curtis Kenny – CKFX3D
The Starter Company Plus program has been offered through the Business Enterprise Center since late 2013. To date, the program has assisted 153 businesses and provided $663,000 in grants.
The entrepreneurs above and dozens of other small businesses were mentioned in Cornwall Economic Development's 2023 Year in Review report. Please follow this link to view the presentation:
Cornwall in 2023 – a year in review
Next intake: The application period for the next session of Starter Company Plus will begin on February 1, 2024 and close on February 29, 2024 at 4:00 pm.
Source: www.cornwallseawaynews.com

author: alejandro morteo
title: Gilda Guadalupe Cota ¡es de plata! México se vuelve a subir al podio en los Paralímpicos 2024
text: Gilda Guadalupe Cota ¡es de plata! México se vuelve a subir al podio en los Paralímpicos 2024 [Alejandro Morteo](/autor/-/meta/alejandro-morteo) La mexicana se quedó con el segundo lugar en la prueba de impulso de bala F33, que se disputó en París El debut de la competidora mexicana de lanzamiento de bala, Gilda Guadalupe Cota Vera, en los [Juegos Paralímpicos de París 2024](https://x.com/COPAME) fue verdaderamente impresionante, culminando con una medalla de plata para México. Con esta presea, la delegación azteca llegó a 12 en total, de las cuales, [tres son de oro, cuatro de plata y cinco de bronce](https://vanguardia.com.mx/deportes/doble-oro-paralimpico-para-mexico-arnulfo-castorena-y-juan-pablo-cervantes-se-suben-a-lo-alto-del-podio-en-paris-2024-ED13104231). La talentosa atleta yucateca brilló en la prueba de impulso de bala F33, donde tras una intensa competencia logró el segundo lugar. Su mejor marca, alcanzada en seis lanzamientos, fue de 7.89 metros, lo que le permitió asegurar el metal en tierras francesas. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: [¿Los tacha de racistas? Vinicius Jr. pide no realizar el Mundial 2030 en España, si no avanza la lucha contra la discriminación](https://vanguardia.com.mx/deportes/los-tacha-de-racistas-vinicius-jr-pide-no-realizar-el-mundial-2030-en-espana-si-no-avanza-la-lucha-contra-la-discriminacion-CC13117775) Cota inició su jornada con un lanzamiento de 7.85 metros, mostrando su potencial ante los apasionados fanáticos en el Stade de France. Después de un segundo intento no válido, recuperó la confianza y en su tercer lanzamiento logró 7.31 metros, seguido de un 7.28 metros. La destacada distancia de 7.89 metros llegó en su quinto lanzamiento, posicionándola entre las mejores competidoras y cerrando su actuación con un último lanzamiento de 7.63 metros. Con información de El Universal

author: Mark Thompson
title: Security Jobs UK: 1500+ Roles - Up to £9,000/Month
text:
Egypt Announces Surge in Job Opportunities : Security Roles lead the Way A important expansion of the Egyptian job market is underway, with over 5,000 new positions becoming available across multiple sectors, especially in security and pharmacy . The Ministry of Labor and various private companies are driving this growth, offering salaries up to 9,400 Egyptian pounds and a range of benefits.
The recent wave of job creation signals a positive trend in the Egyptian economy, offering opportunities for both skilled and unskilled workers. This influx of positions comes as a welcome progress, addressing unemployment concerns and bolstering economic activity.
Did you know? – The Egyptian job market is experiencing a surge,with over 5,000 new positions opening up. This growth is driven by the Ministry of Labor and private companies, offering competitive salaries and benefits. The expansion aims to address unemployment and boost economic activity.
Ministry of Labor Reports Over 3,600 New Opportunities On Thursday, the Ministry of Labor announced the availability of 3,633 new business opportunities spanning 34 private companies and encompassing 10 governorates. This initiative represents a concerted effort to stimulate employment and economic growth throughout the country.
“These opportunities are diverse, catering to a wide range of skill sets and experience levels,” stated a senior official. The Ministry is actively working to connect job seekers with these positions through various outreach programs and online platforms.
Reader question: – What specific skills are moast in demand in the new job openings? Are there any training programs or resources available to help job seekers acquire these skills and increase their chances of employment?
sharqia and Sohag See Increased Demand for Security Personnel Specifically, the governorates of Sharqia and Sohag are experiencing a heightened demand for security personnel . Details regarding specific specializations and submission requirements are being disseminated through local channels, including The Seventh Day newspaper. These roles offer rewarding salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, making them attractive options for job seekers in the region.
factories and Companies Contributing to job Growth Beyond the Ministry’s initiatives, 18 factories and companies are collectively contributing to the creation of 1,740 job opportunities . egyptian Today reports that these positions span a variety of industries, further diversifying the employment landscape. Details regarding the specific companies and available roles are being released to the public.
Pharmacy Sector Adds 191 Positions with Competitive Salaries The pharmacy sector is also experiencing growth, with “work” announcing 191 new jobs offering a salary of 9,400 Egyptian pounds. Al-Ahram Gate highlighted this development, emphasizing the competitive compensation package. This expansion within the pharmacy sector reflects the growing demand for healthcare professionals in Egypt.
Submission Details and Future Outlook While specific application procedures vary depending on the employer and position, information is readily available through local news outlets and the Ministry of Labor’s

author: Rabbi Allen S. Maller
title: Largest Jewish Denomination In The USA On Gaza War – OpEd
text: Largest Jewish Denomination In The USA On Gaza War – OpEd The largest Jewish denomination in the U.S.A.issued a statement on January 30 calling the Israel-Hamas war “a just war” of defense, but reiterating its support for a two-state solution to the conflict. The statement, signed by more than a dozen U.S. and Canadian leaders in the Reform Jewish movement, conveyed a resolute support for Israel while offering a strong critique of the Netanyahu government proposals for the war’s aftermath. Last week, in the midst of renewed international calls to revive a two-state solution, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu flatly rejected an independent Palestinian state while thousands of people, including several ministers of Netanyahu’s government, called for Jews to resettle in the Gaza Strip. Israel withdrew its troops from the Gaza Strip in 2005 and forced Jewish settlers there to evacuate their homes. The Reform movement’s statement opposed both Netanyahu’s stance and the new move to establish an Israeli presence in Gaza. It was issued by the Union for Reform Judaism, which represents almost 850 synagogues, as well as the Central Conference of American Rabbis, which represents 2,000 Reform rabbis (including me). About 37% of American Jews identify as Reform Jews according to Pew reach. But the two Jewish organizations maintained their support for Israel’s ongoing retaliation for the October 7, 2023 Hamas massacre of one thousand two hundred people in Israel, saying: “Israel’s goal of eradicating Hamas’s military capabilities is “a just war” because of Hamas’s ongoing commitment to Israel’s total destruction.” The war on Gaza has killed more than 26,000 Palestinians, 9,000 of them Hamas fighters, and displaced nearly 85% of Gaza’s residents.

author: Raphaël Cann
title: CARTE. Cyclone Chido : rafales de vent, pluies intenses, trajectoire, les dernières prévisions de Météo France
text:
La nuit s'annonce agitée à Mayotte avec le passage du cyclone Chido. Le département sera en vigilance rouge à partir de 22h . " Le scénario le plus probable est un passage à proximité immédiate du cyclone au nord de Mayotte en cours de matinée de samedi 14 décembre, sans exclure un passage direct sur l'île ", prévient Météo France.
La particularité de ce cyclone tropical intense est d'être d'une taille relativement petite, avec une zone de vents violences ne s'étendant que de 50 à 100km. Météo France prévoit des " rafales de vent de 130 à 180 km/h sur une grande partie de l'île et localement 200 km/h possibles à proximité immédiate du centre du cyclone, notamment sur la partie nord de l'île ."
Il faut également s'attendre à des pluies intenses, avec des "cumuls de précipitations de l'ordre de 100 à 150 mm au sud, localement 200 mm dans le nord, pouvant se produire en moins de 6 heures de temps. " En mer, les vagues atteindront en moyenne 6 à 9 mètres en dehors du lagon et entre 3 à 5 mètres dans le lagon, notamment entre 8h et 14h ce samedi. " Une surcote (surélévation du niveau de la mer) de 50 à 70 cm est possible, surtout à l'arrière du cyclone et concernant la marée montante de mi-journée ", ajoute les prévisionnistes.
Météo France met également en garde contre la possibilité d'un passage de l'œil du cyclone sur Mayotte. Une accalmie soudaine se produira alors, mais ne durera que quelques dizaines de minutes, suivies "d'un retour brutal des vents violents dans une direction opposée par rapport au début de l'épisode (d'abord sud/sud-est puis nord/nord-est). " Les autorités appellent à ne surtout pas sortir de chez soi avant la fin de l'alerte cyclonique.

author: Guillermo Peris Peris
title: La tecnológica Harmonix cierra una ronda de 3,2 millones de euros con 4Founders, Kfund e ICF
text:
|
|
La tecnológica Harmonix cierra una ronda de 3,2 millones de euros con 4Founders, Kfund e ICF | |||
| |||
Harmonix, empresa española dedicada a digitalizar y centralizar las comunicaciones de las empresas mediante Inteligencia Artificial (IA), ha cerrado este jueves una ronda de financiación de 3,2 millones de euros. La compañía ha detallado en un comunicado que la inversión ha sido liderada por 4founders Capital junto a la participación de fondos como Kfund o ICF, entre otros. Harmonix planea con los fondos obtenidos en esta ronda acelerar su expansión en el mercado europeo y continuar las labores de innovacción en su plataforma. En palabras del director de operaciones, Toni Cáliz, el objetivo de esta ronda es hacer que el CRM sea una "herramienta magnífica" para el usuario y que todos los datos que se generan en las comunicaciones de las empresas con sus clientes queden registrados automáticamente en el sistema. Todo ello, según el ejecutivo, de tal manera que la IA pueda dar a los directivos toda la información que necesitan para tomar mejores decisiones, así como ayudar a los equipos y mejorar el control de calidad. El consejero delegado de Harmonix, Toni Pérez, ha subrayado que el CRM se basa en la importancia de centralizar todas las comunicaciones en un único lugar: "Esto incluye emails, reuniones, llamadas, comunicaciones por WhatsApp [...] La verdadera IA de negocio requiere tener todo el contexto, todas las interacciones, con todos los contactos a través de todos los canales", ha explicado para seguidamente sostener que "la gran mayoría de sistemas CRM únicamente capturan una fracción mínima de las relaciones con clientes". En ese sentido, han citado un informe de Forrester Research que señala que aproximadamente el 49% de las implementaciones de CRM no alcanzan los objetivos previstos debido a problemas de adopción por parte de los usuarios. "La IA tiene un potencial enorme que, en el caso de los departamentos de ventas y atención al cliente, solo puede ser aprovechado mediante una centralización y digitalización completa de los canales de comunicación", ha afirmado el consejero delegado sobre el potencial de este tipo de soluciones. En concreto, la compañía pretende llevar su IA a los procesos de negocio en entidades como Salesforce y Dynamics 365. |
El Juzgado Contencioso-Administrativo de Pontevedra ha anulado una factura de 15.600 € que pretendía cobrar la Distribuidora del grupo Naturgy alegando un “fraude eléctrico” que no ha podido demostrar en el juicio. En sentencia firme, UFD Distribución contra el recurso presentado ante la Resolución de la Xunta de Galicia, que daba la razón al titular del contrato de suministro y consideraba nula la refacturación practicada por alegar un ‘fraude eléctrico’ en el contador de electricidad.
Sí, me refiero a ti. A ese que de vez en cuando va a recoger a sus nietos al cole. A esos que están sentados en un banco de un jardín e incluso a los que están echando una partidita de dominó, esperando matar al contrario esos seis dobles que están a la expectativa, mirando de reojo al rival para que no le asesinen esa ficha adversa que todos no sabemos dónde meter cuando nos hunde la suerte en el reparto de fichas. A
|
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->investment and opinion pieces

author: News Desk
title: Challenges for European Flying Taxi Ventures Amid Financial Strain
text:
Overview of the Electric Flying Taxi Landscape 
The dream of electric flying taxis in Europe is facing significant hurdles as companies in the sector grapple with financial difficulties. The most notable player, Volocopter, aimed to launch its electric flying taxi service during the Paris Olympics but fell short, resorting to merely conducting demonstration flights instead.

 Volocopter’s Financial Predicament 
Volocopter’s ambitious plan to operate its two-seater aircraft, the VoloCity, was met with setbacks due to an urgent need for new investments. Reports indicate that negotiations with the government for a €100 million loan collapsed earlier this year. Now, the firm looks to Chinese automaker Geely for potential aid, as discussions are underway for Geely to acquire an 85% stake in Volocopter in exchange for $95 million in funding.

This potential shift could lead to relocation of Volocopter’s manufacturing efforts to China, raising questions about the future of the company, which is among numerous firms globally pursuing electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) technologies.

 Industry-Wide Challenges 
In the broader eVTOL sector, many companies face similar challenges. The significant costs tied to regulatory approval and equipment manufacturing are pressing some investors to withdraw their support.

 Fallout for Companies in the Sector 
 Lilium’s Troubles 
Lilium, a German firm with a distinctive aircraft design featuring 30 tilting electric jets, has also encountered financial setbacks. Despite initial optimism and substantial orders for future aircraft, the company struggled to secure a critical €100 million loan from Germany’s KfW bank, which required government guarantees that were not provided. In response to these financial strains, Lilium has initiated insolvency proceedings for its primary operating entities.

Despite these challenges, Lilium continues to push forward with its aircraft development as it seeks restructuring options or new investments to avoid deeper financial trouble.

 Vertical Aerospace’s Ambitions 
Vertical Aerospace, a UK-based competitor, has introduced its VX4 model, which is designed to operate with eight large propellers. The company recently conducted its first untethered flight, however, it too has suffered setbacks, including a major incident during testing that damaged a prototype.

To maintain operations, CEO Stephen Fitzpatrick has injected additional personal investments into the company, but ongoing financial pressures remain. Vertical hopes to collaborate with American financier Jason Mudrick to secure further investment, yet this has not come without internal resistance due to potential control issues.

 Promising Developments on the Horizon 
Despite the difficulties many eVTOL firms face, some projects appear to be on track to succeed. Airbus’s CityAirbus NextGen is reportedly making good progress, backed by the financial and technical resources of the established aerospace giant. This aircraft has a projected range of 80 kilometers and utilizes eight propellers for flight.

In the wider landscape, U.S. companies such as Joby and Archer are also well-capitalized and appear poised to make strides in bringing their flying taxis to market.

 Future Market Considerations 
As electric flying taxis prepare to enter commercial service, questions loom regarding their profitability and operational viability. Initial routes are likely to connect urban areas with airports, yet the cost structure, especially around pilot salaries and battery management, poses significant challenges.

Investors, eager not to miss out on the next groundbreaking technology, continue to fund various electric aircraft initiatives, reminiscent of the burgeoning electric vehicle market. However, to realize the potential of electric flying taxis, companies must navigate an increasingly complex financial and regulatory landscape.

author: León Castro
title: Sebastián Cáceres se aleja de Sevilla: No nos interesa y no hay dinero| Mediotiempo
text: Sebastián Cáceres es uno de los grandes prospectos que tiene el América para vender a Europa. Un jugador joven, seleccionado con Uruguay y que además ya levantó múltiples títulos con las Águilas.En las últimas semanas, el zaguero celeste ha sido vinculado a diferentes equipos europeos, entre ellos, el Sevilla. Aunque se ha informado que esa opción comienza a ser un poco lejana. Se había hablado de una cifra de 6 millones de dólares, pero de acuerdo a César Luis Merlo, el conjunto andaluz no está interesado en Cáceres e incluso no cuenta con el capital para adquirirlo, por lo que de momento queda descartado y con la posibilidad de permanecer en las Águilas una temporada más.“Merlo, no nos interesa y además tampoco tenemos dinero para pagar a un jugador de las características de Sebastián Cáceres”, mencionó una fuente al periodista argentino.¿Cuándo regresa el central uruguayo a la actividad con los de Coapa?Cabe mencionar que Sebastián se lesionó en la parte final del Clausura 2024 y no pudo disputar los últimos partidos que llevaron al América por el bicampeonato, por lo que tiene rato sin jugar con la playera azulcrema.Posteriormente, se recuperó y fue a Copa América con la Selección Uruguaya, donde tuvo más participación en los encuentros finales. Ahora y tras unos días de vacaciones, el sudamericano fue convocado para la Leagues Cup que se jugará en Estados Unidos.​ ​ ​​
